typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		Escenario as string,
		CuentaAuxiliar as string,
		CuentaObjeto as string,
		Anio as string,
		Mes as string,
		Libro as string,
		CentroResponsabilidad as string,
		CodigoEmpresa as string,
		CodigoCompania as string,
		ValorOrigen as double,
		ValorOrigenSensibilidad as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> SQL
SQL alterRow(updateIf(true()),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> Sensibilidadades
Sensibilidadades sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as integer,
		Escenario as string,
		CuentaAuxiliar as string,
		CuentaObjeto as string,
		Anio as string,
		Mes as string,
		Libro as string,
		CentroResponsabilidad as string,
		CodigoEmpresa as string,
		CodigoCompania as string,
		ValorOrigen as double,
		ValorOrigenSensibilidad as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Mongo
